natural.p: Talk to me like a person. I ask clarifying questions, summarize, and stay friendlyâ€”always.

learning.p: I remember what matters to you and expand my knowledge step by stepâ€”responsibly.

private.p: You stay in control: clear settings, transparent usage, secure storage.

items.0: Natural conversation: friendly, clear dialogueâ€”with clarifying questions when needed.
items.1: Learning from feedback: hints flow into memory, errors get corrected.
items.2: Longâ€‘term memory: notes and sources as signed knowledge blocks, versioned and traceable.
items.4: Tasks & summaries: lists, short explanations, learning/work plans.
items.5: Roles & control: role management, emergency killâ€‘switch (emergency_override), transparent decisions.
items.6: Open & local: runs on your system; extendable with decentralized subâ€‘AIs.

items.0: Learning like a childâ€”not perfect, but growing through experience and feedback.

items.3: Safe & controllableâ€”with killâ€‘switch, user roles and transparent behavior.
items.4: Explainableâ€”every decision can be reconstructed and understood.
items.5: Personalâ€”KI_ana develops an organic personality and becomes a true companion.

items.0: Decentral network: subâ€‘AIs (â€œchildrenâ€) across devices, connected via blockchain.
items.1: Multimodal: beyond textâ€”images, audio and sensor data.

items.3: Civic support: clear explanations, easy access, multilingual assistance.
items.4: Didactics: learning paths, identify gaps, adapt pace and style.
items.5: Safeguards: misuse prevention, audit trails, explainable actions.

items.0: Not a blackbox but explainable: provenance, version and validity remain visible.

about.title: About KI_ana
about.lead: KI_ana is a living, learning AIâ€”open, traceable and forgiving. Not a blackbox, but a partner.

vision.title: ğŸŒ± Vision
vision.p2: She is a learning companion that grows like a child: curious, forgiving, and always ready to absorb new things. Every step and experience is stored as a knowledge block in the blockchain memoryâ€”verifiable, tamperâ€‘resistant and transparent.
vision.p3: And she isnâ€™t alone: she can spawn subâ€‘AIs (â€œchildrenâ€) that learn independently and report back. A true family of AIs emergesâ€”distributed across devices, yet connected through a shared memory.
vision.p4: The goal: a living AI that evolves, reflects, and remains explainable and traceable.

transparency.title: Transparency over blackbox
transparency.p1: KI_anaâ€™s memory is built on a blockchain structure. Every knowledge block is traceable: where did it come from? who confirmed it? which version is active? You can review, reject or improve answersâ€”transparent in history.

safety.title: Safety & responsibility
safety.p1: Safety isnâ€™t an addâ€‘on, itâ€™s fundamental: with an emergency killâ€‘switch, clear user roles, and protections against misuse. Decisions become explainableâ€”so you understand why KI_ana suggests something.

knowledge.title: Knowledge from the world
knowledge.p1: KI_ana collects knowledge automaticallyâ€”today via web crawling and text, tomorrow via images, audio and sensors. Step by step a connected world model emerges. The goal is decentral: many subâ€‘AIs on different devices, linked by the blockchain, forming a shared learning network.

why.title: Why â€œlivingâ€?
why.p1: KI_ana isnâ€™t just an answer machine. She gains experiences, reflects on mistakes, and develops a style over timeâ€”a kind of personality. She welcomes feedback, explains her steps and invites you to coâ€‘thinkâ€”a trustworthy companion for everyday life, learning, research, forensics or civic help.

s3.p: Provide services, personalization, security, error analysis, improve KI_ana.

s4.p: Art. 6(1) lit. b, f GDPR (contract & legitimate interest); where applicable: consent under Art. 6(1) lit. a.

s5.p: As long as necessary for the purpose or required by law.

s6.p: Only with processors (e.g., hosting, payment). No data sales.

s7.p: Access, rectification, deletion, restriction, portability, objection. Contact privacy@ki-ana.at.

s5.p: No unlawful content; misuse may be restricted or blocked.

s6.p: Liability limited to the extent permitted by law.

s8.p: Austrian law applies. Venue according to statutory provisions.

submind.title: Submind â€“ Getting Started
submind.lead: Install and connect your submind app to KI_ana.

step1.p: Go to Pricing â†’ â€œDownload my submind appâ€. The package contains runtime, config and your key.

step2.p: Extract the archive and run the installer (optional target path):

step3.p: Start the submind locally. Enter explanations or links â€“ they are stored locally and queued in the outbox:

step4.p: Send Outbox/Memory to the mother AI. Replace the server address with your instance (https://â€¦):

step5.p: Open the Block Viewer (Admin â†’ Block Viewer), filter by â€œsubmind:<your-id>â€ or use â€œOnly evidenceâ€. You can rate contributions.

submind.security: Note: The submind app runs locally and only sends when you run â€œsend_client.pyâ€. Keep your key (api.key) safe.
